document.full_text: rocker sammy hagar, who once sang "i can't drive 55," might want to move to texas. the california-born singer may be able to drive 85 miles per hour in the lone star state if a measure approved by the texas house becomes law.
document.title: texas house oks 85-mph speed limit, would be nation's highest
lines_and_colors: rocker sammy hagar, who once sang "i can't drive 55," might want to move to texas. the california-born singer may be able to drive 85 miles per hour in the lone star state if a measure approved by the texas house becomes law.
